text:
About stopping un-used components, we use @kedaorg to stop non-prod environments out of working hours and implementing Kafka lag based autoscaling.
We calculate around 60% to 75% less CPU request on our Kubernetes cluster (which lead to 50% nodes being stopped).

3/3
